result.execSummary:
All charges against Steven Knight Widowski in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Steven Knight Widowski is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Criminal Damage to Property (Less Than $2,500 Damage)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Steven Knight Widowski

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Steven Knight Widowski in court.  Attorney Ruby De Leon in court for Steven Knight Widowski.  Prosecuting attorney Julie D Knyszek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Case set for jury trial.  State's essential witness failed to appear.  State has no alternative theory of prosecution.  Defense motion to DISMISS is granted by the Court WITHOUT PREJUDICE.
Received, Filed, and Forwarded to the Judge for review; Order for Defendant to be released from Waukesha County Jail to attend funeral.
Received, Filed, and Forwarded to the Judge for review; Letter to the Court Re: Funeral Pass Request

Defendant Steven Knight Widowski in court with attorney Ruby De Leon.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Matter scheduled for Jury Trial.  State advises Court that essential witness is sick and unable to appear.  State requests adjournment of trial; defense does not object.  Court grants state's motion.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.  Jury trial scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Attorney Ruby De Leon in court, defendant Steven Knight Widowski not in court, in custody.  Joshua Milder appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for final pretrial conference. Court is in trial on another case and is unable to proceed on this matter. Case remains calendared for jury trial on 8/17/2022 at 9:00 am.  Parties are advised that effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Audrey Skwierawski, Branch 41 in Room 501 of the Courthouse.

Attorney Ruby De Leon in court, defendant Steven Knight Widowski not in court, in custody.  Elaine B. Fehrs appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for status conference. Case is in trial posture, defense counsel requests case be placed on the trial calendar. Any pretrial motions to be filed a week before the final pretrial date. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Parties are advised that effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Audrey Skwierawski, Branch 41 in Room 501 of the Courthouse.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Steven Knight Widowski not in court, defendant in custody.  Gerald Henry Alder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for pretrial conference. OPD needs additional time to appoint counsel. Court adjourns case for an attorney to be appointed. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Status conference scheduled for May 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with J.D.G
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Steven Knight Widowski in court with attorney Colleen A Taylor.  Defendant Steven Knight Widowski in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Steven Knight Widowski appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Rosa, Branch 35.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.
This hearing will be streamed live on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d9e3cc7f-7791-ec2d-80d3-5bfcdc106eb3  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
